vsParam: Let's take bento and pies made by [px] to go on a picnic?
Wow~ The air is so fresh!

This is where we often go for adventures,
but it really feels good to just relax here ♪

Well...[px]. Maybe I'm not in a good place to say this
after asking you for so many favors.

You'll take any commission, won't you?
I mean, you never reject any commission...

You are such a nice person, which is rarely seen.
[px], you are really great!

Wow, awesome, [px]!
Totori just praised you... That was a compliment, right?

Oh, [px]! It looks so good.
Could you please make bento for us too?!

That pie looks delicious ♪
Can I try a piece?

Wow!
We're surrounded by so many people...

Wow, that's such a heavy workload...
Are you sure you'll take it?
Haha, anyway, that's what makes [px] such a nice person!
Hehe, good point. Ah, let me help you make bento!
